name: Anime Roblox
description:
A lovely theme for any die hard anime fan.

Update 8/5/2017: Hi! It's been a while. I came online today looking at Youtube videos, and I can't express enough how happy it makes me seeing people use this layout in videos. This means a lot to me all of you. I love you all!

Make sure to checkout my roblox page!
http://bit.ly/1Pm2ct8

discussions.name: Could you help me make a theme for roblox?
